text: The Magadhan Empire was an ancient Indian empire established by Bimbisara in 544 BCE. It succeded the Magadha Kingdom and was ruled by the dynasties of Haryankas, Shishungas, Nandas, Mauryas, Shungas and the Kanvas. == Early rise of power == === Campaign of Anga Kingdom === Bimbisara started a campagin against the Anga Kingdom to avenge his father's previous defeat. The campaign was successful and Anga was annexed into the Magadhan Empire. ==References==
title: Magadhan Empire
